mapper.insert: insert into tbl_user (uid, uname, age, nation, sex, uphoto, email, upw) values (#{uid}, #{uname}, #{age}, #{nation}, #{sex}, #{uphoto}, #{email}, #{upw})
mapper.select: select uid, uname, age, nation, sex, uphoto from tbl_user where uid=#{uid}
select uid, uname, age, nation, sex, uphoto, email from tbl_user where uid=#{uid}
mapper.update: update tbl_user set uname=#{uname}, age=#{age}, nation=#{nation}, sex=#{sex}, uphoto=#{uphoto}, email=#{email} where uid=#{uid}
